Row.Text: An upgraded Coal Power Plant is a true regional industry hub. Bonus +1 [ICON_Production] Production extends to each city center within 9 tiles. Additional +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each specialty district constructed in this city. Adds +3 [ICON_Production] Production to each [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal Mine in this city.

An upgraded Oil Power Plant is a true regional industry hub. Bonus +1 [ICON_Production] Production extends to each city center within 9 tiles. Additional +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each specialty district constructed in this city. Adds +3 [ICON_Production] Production to each [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil Well in this city.

An upgraded Nuclear Power Plant is a true regional industry hub. Bonus +2 [ICON_Production] Production and +1 [ICON_Science] Science extends to each city center within 9 tiles. Additional +2 [ICON_Production] Production for each specialty district constructed in this city. Adds +4 [ICON_Production] Production and +2 [ICON_Science] Science to each [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium Mine in this city.
Provides the city +2 [ICON_Power] Power from renewable water sources. Tiles adjacent to a river gain +1 [ICON_Production] Production.

A building upgrade unique to the Ottomans. Luxury goods bring more tourists and improve trade. Increases +2 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in this city. International [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes from this city gain +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold; domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes gain +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Receive +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every Luxury resource this city has improved.

A building upgrade unique to Hungary. City growth rate is 15% higher. +4 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism in this city. +1 [ICON_Production] Production extends to each city center within 6 tiles.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This city receives +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold and [ICON_Culture] Culture if there is at least one Geothermal Fissure in this city's borders.
